contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of March, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED for further proceedings. See Tooey v. AK Steel Corp., 623 Pa. 60, 81 A.3d 851 (2013).
Respondent’s Application for Consolidation is DISMISSED as moot.
